_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Type or classification of the relationship.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: A relationship predicate indicates the *type*, *nature* or *class* of the relationship. You may have several edges connecting the same nodes, but each edge must have a *different* predicate.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: List of path roots that share the edge.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: This field is an *array* of [global identifiers](_gid) representing the *list* of *paths* sharing the edge: these global identifiers represent the root node of the paths. The field is used to allow more than one path to share the same edge in a *graph*.
